name: The Journey to Join
description:
You are a sphere and it is your job to unite yourself with your own kind. To do this, you need to navigate throughout the map and find the other sphere at the end. You can move with the arrow keys or with W, A, D. Once you get to the other sphere you join together and become a larger sphere, then you will advance to the next level. Good Luck!

My game fits the theme of "Joined Together" because the goal of the game is to join together the spheres. The game also joins diffrent game genres and mini-games.

Please check out my other games! It would mean a lot!

Luna

Candy Catch

Thanks to Danny Rivera & Aim To Head Official for background music!
